content: view the pattern online now https //en susudiy com/detail id=1877566491025477634 the crocheting guidance available as following https //youtu be/wuafhgnhpws **get yarn kit now** shop on susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/peafowl-dance-shawl-crochet-yarn-kit-chinese-aesthetics-series-susans-family there are 2 colors and 2 versions in total **yarn amount** 5# lace version 7 skeins sequin mohair version 4 skeins the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s a new video up
